summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Engineer to incur an indebtedness in an amount not to exceed nine hundred fifty-eight and 30/100 ($958.30) dollars, or so much thereof as may be necessary, against the General Fund of the City of Seattle, on account of the cost and expense of the improvement of Franklin Avenue, by constructing sewers therein, as provided for in Ordinance No. 21184, creating Local Improvement District No. 2090.
